name: Constraint Evaluator
description: Plugin for developers to test, evaluate and add custom constraints.

configStructure.name: mode
configStructure.description: Select if Constraints.js should be evaluated, generated or populated in model.

configStructure.name: clear
configStructure.description: Clear all existing constraints when populating model with constraints.

name: Minimal Working Example
description: Simple plugin illustrating how to save to a model from a plugin.

configStructure.name: shouldFail
configStructure.description: Example if the plugin execution fails

configStructure.name: save
configStructure.description: Will update the model if true
